title: Justify wins Kentucky Derby, breaks 'curse'
text:
Justify wins Kentucky Derby, breaks 'curse' 11:39am EDT - 00:52
‘Justify’ won the 144th running of the Kentucky Derby at Churchill Downs in Louisville, becoming the first horse since Apollo in 1882 to win it without a start as a two-year-old. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
‘Justify’ won the 144th running of the Kentucky Derby at Churchill Downs in Louisville, becoming the first horse since Apollo in 1882 to win it without a start as a two-year-old.
